meta.name: generator
meta.content: MODX file generated with PP MODX Creator by tumba25 (online version)

header.title: eMosbat TinyMCE Integration Spanish Translation
header.description: TinyMCE WYSIWYG Editor Integration with support of smilies and custom BBCodes.
header.author-notes:
- To display icon for custom BBCode, upload 24x24 pixels gif image with same name of custom bbcode to images/bbcodes folder. for example for a custom bbcode with this name: youtube, upload youtube.gif to images/bbcodes folder.
- You may download latest version of tinymce and upload 'tiny_mce' folder to styles/prosilver/template and styles/subsilver2/template folder. in this case do not forget to copy phpbbcode tinymce plugin to plugins folder.
